title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 590.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 590.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The terms
firearm, rifle and shotgun as used in this Part shall be defined as in the

Penal Law. (b) Weapon shall mean
those weapons described in section
265.01
of the

Penal Law. (c) Airgun shall mean
any rifle or pistol operated by compressed air that fires a metallic
projectile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
590.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
